nodes.text: Haven was a small planetoid located in the Minos Cluster of the Outer Rim Territories.

During the Galactic Civil War, Haven served as the site of the Rebel Alliance's primary resistance center in the Minos Cluster. In 3 ABY, shortly after the Battle of Hoth, the Alliance Fleet regrouped at a rendezvous point near Haven. Following his duel with Darth Vader on Bespin, Luke Skywalker received his prosthetic hand while in orbit around Haven.
